
h1. eXo KS 1.1 release notes


h2. Introduction
KS 1.1 final release is version with many new  added features, improvement of current feature and bugs fixed

h2. Notable changes
h3. FAQ 
* Vote 
* RSS feed 
* Multiple answer and comment 
* Manage avatar 
* Manage my watch 
* Discuss in forum

h3. Forum 
* Manage my watches 
* Avatar 
* Pending list 
* Notify with advaned feature 
* Ban IP 
* IP logging 
* Watch my topics and replies options

h2. APIs Changes

h2. How to upgrade from KS 1.0

To deploy KS 1.1you should update version of dependencies to:
  	 * KERNEL:2.0.5
  	 * CORE: 2.1.3
  	 * WS: 1.3.1
  	 * JCR: 1.10.1
  	 * PC: 2.0.4
  	 * PORTAL: 2.5

We provided tool and description to migrate data of KS from 1.0 to 1.1. See http://wiki.exoplatform.org/xwiki/bin/view/Upgrade+1/1 for more detail

h2. System Requirements
* Web Browser: IE6, IE7, FF2, FF3, Safari. Best for Frirefox 3 and IE7
* JVM: 1.5.xx
* Application Server: Tomcat, JBoss, Jonas, Webshpere
* Building Tools: Maven 2.0.6 and up
